remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要功能可讓 Windows Form 和 Web Form 上的資料繫結。A major function of the is to allow for data binding on both Windows Forms and Web Forms. 此外，可以自訂，以呈現資料的子集。Additionally, a can be customized to present a subset of data from the . 這項功能可讓您有兩個控制項繫結至相同，但該顯示不同版本的資料。This capability lets you have two controls bound to the same , but that show different versions of the data. 例如，一個控制項可能會繫結至在資料表中，顯示所有資料列和第二個可能會設定為顯示從已刪除的資料列。For example, one control might be bound to a that shows all the rows in the table, and a second might be configured to display only the rows that have been deleted from the . 還有屬性。The also has a property. 這會傳回預設資料表。This returns the default for the table. 例如，如果您想要建立自訂檢視，在資料表上的，設定上傳回。For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the on the returned by the . 若要建立篩選和排序資料的檢視，請設定和屬性。To create a filtered and sorted view of data, set the and properties. 然後，使用屬性，以傳回單一。Then, use the property to return a single . 您也可以加入和刪除使用的資料列集中和方法。You can also add and delete from the set of rows using the and methods. 當您使用這些方法，屬性可以設定為指定只刪除資料列或新的資料列會顯示由。When you use those methods, the property can set to specify that only deleted rows or new rows be displayed by the . > [!NOTE] > 如果您未明確指定的排序準則`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的物件`DataView`排序依據的 DataView 的對應索引`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of DataView's corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 可讓開發人員建立複雜且功能強大的查詢使用[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]。 allows developers to create complex, powerful queries over a by using [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]. A[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查詢傳回的列舉物件，不過，輕鬆地不是使用中的繫結案例。A [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query returns an enumeration of objects, however, which is not easily used in a binding scenario. 您可以從建立[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查詢，並且篩選和排序查詢的特性。 can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query and takes on the filtering and sorting characteristics of that query. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 透過擴充功能藉由提供[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]運算式為基礎的篩選和排序，如此便能更複雜且功能強大的篩選和排序比以字串為基礎的篩選和排序作業。 extends the functionality of the by providing [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] expression-based filtering and sorting, which allows for much more complex and powerful filtering and sorting operations than string-based filtering and sorting. 請參閱[資料繫結和 LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Data Binding and LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會建立單一具有一個資料行和五個資料列。The following example creates a single with one column and five rows. 兩個會建立物件和上每個設定為 顯示資料表資料的不同檢視。Two objects are created and the is set on each to show different views of the table data. 然後會列印這些值。The values are then printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列範例會建立的線上訂單資訊，請依總計的應付總額[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查詢：The following example creates a of online orders ordered by total due from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromquery1)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromquery1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單值，指定資料行，後面接著一個運算子和值做為篩選條件的名稱。To form a value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on. 值必須以引號。The value must be in quotation marks. 例如: For example: "LastName = 'Smith'""LastName = 'Smith'" 請參閱屬性類別，如需詳細資訊。See the property of the class for more information. 若要傳回只具有 null 值資料行，請使用下列運算式：To return only those columns with null values, use the following expression: "Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'""Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'" ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性。The following example creates a and sets its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有使用已刪除的資料列方法會有其值設定為`Deleted`。Only rows that have been deleted by using the method will have their value set to `Deleted`. 加入使用這些資料列方法同樣必須將屬性設為`Added`。Those rows added using the method will similarly have the property set to `Added`. > [!NOTE] > 使用方法類別並不表示資料列將會標示為`Deleted`。Using the method of the class does not mean that a row will be marked as `Deleted`. 使用方法改為先確定該這類的資料列就可以在檢視。Use the method instead to make sure that such rows can be viewed in the . 新的資料列也會顯示當設`ModifiedCurrent`或`CurrentRows`。New rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedCurrent` or `CurrentRows`. 已刪除資料列也會顯示當設`ModifiedOriginal`和`OriginalRows`。Deleted rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedOriginal` and `OriginalRows`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立與單一資料行，然後按一下 變更集與資料的即可顯示不同的資料列集，取決於。The following example creates a with a single column, and then changes the data and sets the of the to display different row sets, depending on the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未明確指定的排序準則`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的物件`DataView`會根據其相對應的索引排序`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of its corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Dataview](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md)。For more information, see [DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md). ## Examples 下列範例會指示來排序資料表的兩個資料行。The following example instructs the to sort the table by two columns. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回維護來源的下列屬性的值: ， ， ，和。The returned maintains the values of the following properties from the source : , , , and . 在產生的每個資料行包含在基礎的對應屬性的相同複本。Each column in the resulting contains an identical copy of all the corresponding properties in the underlying . 中傳回的執行個體`DataTable`將包含 CLR 語意與一致的值。The instances in the returned `DataTable` will contain values that are consistent with CLR semantics. 也就是使用者定義型別以外的所有資料類型，對應的資料行值會傳值方式都複製。That is, for all data types besides user-defined types, the corresponding column values are copied by value. 使用者定義資料類型，是傳址方式複製資料行的資料。For user-defined data types, the column data is copied by reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為這個方法不會讓您指定的輸出名稱，其名稱為來源的名稱與相同`DataTable`。Because this method does not let you specify the name for the output , its name is the same as the name of the source `DataTable`. 這個方法不會讓您指定可用的資料行的子集，因為輸出資料表會包含相同的資料行做為輸入的資料表。Because this method does not let you specify a subset of available columns, the output table contains the same columns as the input table. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式範例會建立，填滿取代資料，會建立根據原始資料，在篩選的檢視，最後，建立，其中包含已篩選的資料列。The following console application example creates a , fills the with data, creates a filtered view based on the original data, and finally, creates a that contains the filtered rows. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會在主控台視窗中顯示以下文字：The example displays the following text in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 Current Values in View 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 Table created from filtered DataView 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 New table name: NewTable ```
